до глобуса дойти нереально, застряешь на калшаах и сидишь на них всю жизнь

If you like playing a game full of hackers, then this is for you.

If you like playing a game where some of the community blatantly accuse you of being a hacker just cause you down vote this game due to hackers, then this toxic community is for you. 

Continuing from above, these toxic communities made up conspiracy theories, that you're the existing hacker who created a new steam account, just to down vote this game. Read the comment section on some of the [b]most helpful negative review[/b]. You will find some of these guys.

My actual theory!? Anyone who falsely accuse you of hacking are the actual hackers.
